validation.sameLanguageError: Native language and default learning language must be different

withdrawal.title: Confirm Account Deletion
withdrawal.message:
Are you sure you want to delete your account?

This action will permanently delete all of the following data:
• User information
• Created phrases
• Speaking history
• Quiz results
• Situations

This action cannot be undone.
withdrawal.emailConfirmLabel: Please enter your registered email address to confirm
withdrawal.success: Account deleted successfully. You will be redirected to the login page.
withdrawal.error: Failed to delete account. Please try again later.
withdrawal.emailMismatch: The entered email address does not match the registered email address

confirm.unsavedPhrase: Generated phrases have not been saved. Do you want to leave this page?
confirm.unsavedCount: Reading aloud count has not been saved. Do you want to leave this page?

common.loginRequired: You need to login to use this feature

phrase.noPhrasesYet: No phrases have been registered yet

placeholders.phraseInput: Example: Where have you been recently?

messages.noPhrasesForQuiz: No phrases found with the specified conditions
messages.dailyLimitExceeded: You have exceeded today's generation limit. Please try again tomorrow.

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this phrase?

resetTime.title: Reset Time
resetTime.description:
Daily reset at UTC 0:00
• Japan： 9:00 AM
• US East Coast： 8:00/7:00 PM
• US West Coast： 5:00/4:00 PM
※ DST/Standard Time

dailyLimit.title: Daily Usage Limit
dailyLimit.description: You can use the phrase generation feature up to 5 times per day. Let's steadily build up 5 phrases every day.

messages.dailyLimitReached: You have reached the daily limit of 100 speaks. Please try again tomorrow!
messages.countError: Error occurred while updating speak count
messages.phraseCountFetchFailedEmpty: Failed to fetch phrase count (empty response)
messages.noPracticeablePhrases: No phrases available to practice in this mode
messages.phraseCountCheckError: Error occurred while checking phrase count

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.description: Read the displayed phrases aloud and press the count button each time you practice to record your practice count.

goals.title: Goals and Practice Count
goals.description: Aim to practice reading aloud 10 times a day. We recommend reading each phrase aloud at least 50 times. Through consistent and repetitive practice, phrases will naturally come out of your mouth.

effectiveMethods.title: Effective Practice Methods
effectiveMethods.naturalSpeed: Repeat until you can read at natural speed
effectiveMethods.understanding: Practice while understanding the meaning of phrases
effectiveMethods.pronunciation: Imagine using phrases in real situations

messages.noSpeechesAvailable: No speeches found matching the criteria
messages.countError: An error occurred while retrieving speech count

subscription.subscriptionRequired: Basic Plan subscription required to use AI phrase generation
subscription.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will lose access to AI phrase generation immediately.

speak.streak: Continued reading aloud for {count} consecutive days!

quiz.weekly: Got {count} quiz answers correct this week!
quiz.total: Got {count} quiz answers correct so far!
quiz.streak: Got quiz answers correct for {count} consecutive days!

error.failed: Error occurred while generating post link

modal.supportMessage: Solo Speak is supporting your speaking practice journey.
modal.popupBlockedError: The authentication screen is taking time to display. Please check if popups are not blocked.

xApp.title: When opened from X app
xApp.step1: Tap the "Safari icon" at the bottom right

lineApp.title: When opened from LINE app
lineApp.step1: Tap the "..." menu at the bottom right

general.title: For other apps
general.description: Most apps have a menu button (..., ↗) at the top or bottom-right corner where you can find options like "Open in browser", "Open in Safari", or "Open in external browser".

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this situation?
